amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to ensure funds for additionally considering the historic and national significance of dredging projects in allocating Army Corps additional funding.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Keating.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
